mapper.sql: ONHAND_ID, ORGANIZATION_ID, ITEM_ID, SUBINVENTORY_ID, LOCATION_ID, LOT_NUMBER, UOM_CODE, QUANTITY, LAST_TRANSACTION_ID, INIT_TRANSACTION_ID, OBJECT_VERSION_NUMBER, REQUEST_ID, PROGRAM_ID, CREATION_DATE, CREATED_BY, LAST_UPDATED_BY, LAST_UPDATE_DATE, LAST_UPDATE_LOGIN, ATTRIBUTE_CATEGORY, ATTRIBUTE1, ATTRIBUTE2, ATTRIBUTE3, ATTRIBUTE4, ATTRIBUTE5, ATTRIBUTE6, ATTRIBUTE7, ATTRIBUTE8, ATTRIBUTE9, ATTRIBUTE10, ATTRIBUTE11, ATTRIBUTE12, ATTRIBUTE13, ATTRIBUTE14, ATTRIBUTE15
mapper.insert:
select UNIX_TIMESTAMP()*1000+floor(rand()*1000) from dual
insert into INV_ONHAND_QUANTITY (ONHAND_ID, ORGANIZATION_ID, ITEM_ID, SUBINVENTORY_ID, LOCATION_ID, LOT_NUMBER, UOM_CODE, QUANTITY, LAST_TRANSACTION_ID, INIT_TRANSACTION_ID, OBJECT_VERSION_NUMBER, REQUEST_ID, PROGRAM_ID, CREATION_DATE, CREATED_BY, LAST_UPDATED_BY, LAST_UPDATE_DATE, LAST_UPDATE_LOGIN, ATTRIBUTE_CATEGORY, ATTRIBUTE1, ATTRIBUTE2, ATTRIBUTE3, ATTRIBUTE4, ATTRIBUTE5, ATTRIBUTE6, ATTRIBUTE7, ATTRIBUTE8, ATTRIBUTE9, ATTRIBUTE10, ATTRIBUTE11, ATTRIBUTE12, ATTRIBUTE13, ATTRIBUTE14, ATTRIBUTE15) values (#{onhandId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{organizationId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{itemId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{subinventoryId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{locationId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{lotNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{uomCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{quantity,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{lastTransactionId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{initTransactionId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, 1, #{requestId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{programId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, -1, -1, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, #{lastUpdateLogin,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{attributeCategory,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attribute1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attribute2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attribute3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attribute4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attribute5,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attribute6,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attribute7,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attribute8,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attribute9,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attribute10,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attribute11,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attribute12,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attribute13,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attribute14,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{attribute15,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

select UNIX_TIMESTAMP()*1000+floor(rand()*1000) from dual

mapper.update:
update INV_ONHAND_QUANTITY
ORGANIZATION_ID = #{organizationId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ITEM_ID = #{itemId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
SUBINVENTORY_ID = #{subinventoryId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
LOCATION_ID = #{locationId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
LOT_NUMBER = #{lotNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UOM_CODE = #{uomCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
QUANTITY = #{quantity,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
LAST_TRANSACTION_ID = #{lastTransactionId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
INIT_TRANSACTION_ID = #{initTransactionId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
OBJECT_VERSION_NUMBER = OBJECT_VERSION_NUMBER + 1,
REQUEST_ID = #{requestId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
PROGRAM_ID = #{programId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CREATED_BY = #{createdBy,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
LAST_UPDATED_BY = #{lastUpdatedBy,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
LAST_UPDATE_DATE = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
LAST_UPDATE_LOGIN = #{lastUpdateLogin,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
ATTRIBUTE_CATEGORY = #{attributeCategory,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ATTRIBUTE1 = #{attribute1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ATTRIBUTE2 = #{attribute2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ATTRIBUTE3 = #{attribute3,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ATTRIBUTE4 = #{attribute4,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ATTRIBUTE5 = #{attribute5,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ATTRIBUTE6 = #{attribute6,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ATTRIBUTE7 = #{attribute7,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ATTRIBUTE8 = #{attribute8,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ATTRIBUTE9 = #{attribute9,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ATTRIBUTE10 = #{attribute10,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ATTRIBUTE11 = #{attribute11,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ATTRIBUTE12 = #{attribute12,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ATTRIBUTE13 = #{attribute13,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ATTRIBUTE14 = #{attribute14,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ATTRIBUTE15 = #{attribute15,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where ONHAND_ID = #{onhandId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

update INV_ONHAND_QUANTITY set ORGANIZATION_ID = #{organizationId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ITEM_ID = #{itemId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, SUBINVENTORY_ID = #{subinventoryId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, LOCATION_ID = #{locationId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, LOT_NUMBER = #{lotNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UOM_CODE = #{uomCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, QUANTITY = #{quantity,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, LAST_TRANSACTION_ID = #{lastTransactionId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, INIT_TRANSACTION_ID = #{initTransactionId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, OBJECT_VERSION_NUMBER = OBJECT_VERSION_NUMBER + 1, REQUEST_ID = #{requestId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, PROGRAM_ID = #{programId,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
CREATED_BY = #{createdBy,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, LAST_UPDATED_BY = #{lastUpdatedBy,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, LAST_UPDATE_DATE = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, LAST_UPDATE_LOGIN = #{lastUpdateLogin,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, ATTRIBUTE_CATEGORY = #{attributeCategory,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTRIBUTE1 = #{attribute1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTRIBUTE2 = #{attribute2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTRIBUTE3 = #{attribute3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTRIBUTE4 = #{attribute4,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTRIBUTE5 = #{attribute5,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTRIBUTE6 = #{attribute6,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTRIBUTE7 = #{attribute7,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTRIBUTE8 = #{attribute8,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTRIBUTE9 = #{attribute9,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTRIBUTE10 = #{attribute10,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTRIBUTE11 = #{attribute11,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTRIBUTE12 = #{attribute12,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTRIBUTE13 = #{attribute13,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTRIBUTE14 = #{attribute14,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ATTRIBUTE15 = #{attribute15,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ONHAND_ID = #{onhandId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
mapper.select: select sum(ioq.QUANTITY) quantity from INV_ONHAND_QUANTITY_V ioq , inv_item_b ii where ioq.item_id = ii.item_id and ii.item_id = #{packageItemId,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and ioq.ORGANIZATION_ID=#{organizationId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}

select ioq.organization_id,
ioq.subinventory_id,
ioq.location_id,
ioq.item_id,
ioq.lot_number,
ioq.uom_code, SUM(ioq.quantity) quantity from INV_ONHAND_QUANTITY ioq left join INV_ITEM_PROPERTY_V itpv on itpv.item_id = ioq.item_id and coalesce(cast(itpv.organization_id as number),ioq.organization_id) = ioq.organization_id
ioq.ORGANIZATION_ID = #{organizationId,jdbcType=DECIMAL} and itpv.ITEM_ID = #{itemId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
AND ioq.SUBINVENTORY_ID = #{subinventoryId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
AND ioq.LOCATION_ID = #{locationId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
AND ioq.LOT_NUMBER = #{lotNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
GROUP BY ioq.organization_id,
ioq.subinventory_id,
ioq.location_id,
ioq.item_id,
ioq.lot_number,
ioq.uom_code order by min(ioq.init_transaction_id) asc

SELECT SUM(ioq.quantity) -
coalesce((SELECT
SUM(dodlt.outstanding_qty - coalesce(dodlt.return_qty,0))
SUM(dodl.outstanding_qty)
FROM om_sales_line osl, dm_order_delivery dod, dm_order_delivery_line dodl
,dm_order_delivery_lot dodlt
WHERE dod.delivery_id = dodl.delivery_id
AND dodl.line_id = dodlt.delivery_line_id
AND dodl.order_line_id = osl.line_id AND dod.inv_org_id = ioq.organization_id AND osl.item_id = itpv.item_id
AND coalesce(dodlt.lot_number, chr(10)) = coalesce(ioq.lot_number, chr(10))
AND (dod.delivery_status = 'PDDL' or dod.delivery_status = 'NEW' )),0) quantity FROM inv_onhand_quantity ioq left join INV_ITEM_PROPERTY_V itpv on itpv.count_item_id = ioq.item_id and cast(itpv.organization_id as number) = ioq.organization_id
ioq.ORGANIZATION_ID IN (SELECT spma.INV_ORG_ID FROM SPM_SUPPLY spma WHERE spma.SALES_ORG_ID = #{organizationId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}) and itpv.ITEM_ID = #{itemId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
AND ioq.SUBINVENTORY_ID = #{subinventoryId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
AND ioq.LOCATION_ID = #{locationId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
AND ioq.LOT_NUMBER = #{lotNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
GROUP BY ioq.organization_id ,itpv.item_id
,ioq.subinventory_id
,ioq.location_id
,ioq.lot_number

SELECT SUM(ioq.quantity) - (COALESCE((SELECT
SUM(dodlt.outstanding_qty - coalesce(dodlt.return_qty,0))
SUM(dodl.outstanding_qty)
FROM om_sales_line osl, dm_order_delivery dod, dm_order_delivery_line dodl
,dm_order_delivery_lot dodlt
WHERE dod.delivery_id = dodl.delivery_id
AND dodl.line_id = dodlt.delivery_line_id
AND dodl.order_line_id = osl.line_id AND dod.inv_org_id = ioq.organization_id AND osl.item_id = itpv.item_id
AND coalesce(dodlt.lot_number, chr(10)) = coalesce(ioq.lot_number, chr(10))
AND dod.delivery_status IN ('NEW','PDDL') AND NOT exists(SELECT * FROM OM_SALES_ORDER oso WHERE dod.ORDER_HEADER_ID = oso.HEADER_ID AND oso.ORDER_STATUS IN ('REF'))),0) + COALESCE((SELECT SUM(osl.QUANTITY) FROM OM_SALES_ORDER oso, OM_SALES_LINE osl WHERE oso.header_id = osl.header_id AND osl.DEFAULT_INV_ORG_ID = ioq.organization_id AND OSL.ITEM_ID = itpv.item_id AND OSO.ORDER_STATUS IN ('CHECK','WPAY','COMP','REFUN','REFU') AND NOT EXISTS(SELECT * FROM om_sales_line osl, dm_order_delivery dod, dm_order_delivery_line dodl WHERE dod.delivery_id = dodl.delivery_id AND dodl.order_line_id = osl.line_id AND dod.inv_org_id = ioq.organization_id AND dod.ORDER_HEADER_ID = oso.HEADER_ID AND osl.item_id = itpv.item_id AND dod.delivery_status IN ('NEW','PCKUP','SHIPP','PDDL','CANCL'))),0) ) quantity FROM inv_onhand_quantity ioq left join INV_ITEM_PROPERTY_V itpv on itpv.count_item_id = ioq.item_id and cast(itpv.organization_id as number) = ioq.organization_id
ioq.organization_id IN (SELECT IAS.ASSIGN_VALUE FROM INV_ITEM_B IB LEFT OUTER JOIN INV_ITEM_ASSIGN IAS ON IAS.ITEM_ID = IB.ITEM_ID WHERE IB.ITEM_ID = itpv.ITEM_ID AND IAS.ASSIGN_TYPE = 'INV' AND IAS.ENABLED_FLAG = 'Y' AND IAS.ATTRIBUTE1 = 'Y') and itpv.ITEM_ID = #{itemId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
AND ioq.SUBINVENTORY_ID = #{subinventoryId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
AND ioq.LOCATION_ID = #{locationId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
AND ioq.LOT_NUMBER = #{lotNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
GROUP BY ioq.organization_id ,itpv.item_id
,ioq.subinventory_id
,ioq.location_id
,ioq.lot_number

SELECT SUM(ioq.quantity) - (COALESCE((SELECT
SUM(dodlt.outstanding_qty - coalesce(dodlt.return_qty,0))
SUM(dodl.outstanding_qty)
FROM om_sales_line osl, dm_order_delivery dod, dm_order_delivery_line dodl
,dm_order_delivery_lot dodlt
WHERE dod.delivery_id = dodl.delivery_id
AND dodl.line_id = dodlt.delivery_line_id
AND dodl.order_line_id = osl.line_id AND dod.inv_org_id = ioq.organization_id AND osl.item_id = itpv.item_id
AND coalesce(dodlt.lot_number, chr(10)) = coalesce(ioq.lot_number, chr(10))
AND dod.delivery_status IN ('NEW','PDDL') AND NOT exists(SELECT * FROM OM_SALES_ORDER oso WHERE dod.ORDER_HEADER_ID = oso.HEADER_ID AND oso.ORDER_STATUS IN ('REF'))),0) + COALESCE((SELECT SUM(osl.QUANTITY) FROM OM_SALES_ORDER oso, OM_SALES_LINE osl WHERE oso.header_id = osl.header_id AND osl.DEFAULT_INV_ORG_ID = ioq.organization_id AND OSL.ITEM_ID = itpv.item_id AND OSO.ORDER_STATUS IN ('WPAY','COMP','REFUN','REFU') AND NOT EXISTS(SELECT * FROM om_sales_line osl, dm_order_delivery dod, dm_order_delivery_line dodl WHERE dod.delivery_id = dodl.delivery_id AND dodl.order_line_id = osl.line_id AND dod.inv_org_id = ioq.organization_id AND dod.ORDER_HEADER_ID = oso.HEADER_ID AND osl.item_id = itpv.item_id AND dod.delivery_status IN ('NEW','PCKUP','SHIPP','PDDL','CANCL'))),0) ) quantity FROM inv_onhand_quantity ioq left join INV_ITEM_PROPERTY_V itpv on itpv.count_item_id = ioq.item_id and cast(itpv.organization_id as number) = ioq.organization_id
ioq.organization_id IN (SELECT IAS.ASSIGN_VALUE FROM INV_ITEM_B IB LEFT OUTER JOIN INV_ITEM_ASSIGN IAS ON IAS.ITEM_ID = IB.ITEM_ID WHERE IB.ITEM_ID = itpv.ITEM_ID AND IAS.ASSIGN_TYPE = 'INV' AND IAS.ENABLED_FLAG = 'Y' AND IAS.ATTRIBUTE1 = 'Y') and itpv.item_id = #{itemId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
AND ioq.SUBINVENTORY_ID = #{subinventoryId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
AND ioq.LOCATION_ID = #{locationId,jdbcType=DECIMAL}
AND ioq.LOT_NUMBER = #{lotNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
GROUP BY ioq.organization_id ,itpv.item_id
,ioq.subinventory_id
,ioq.location_id
,ioq.lot_number
select item_number from inv_item_b where item_number like concat(lower(#{itemNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}),'%')

select lot_number from inv_lot where lot_number like concat(lower(#{lotNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}),'%')
ORDER BY ${_colName} ${sortorder}
